targets.query: SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("conferences") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /./) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") from (SELECT last("participants") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /./) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("endpoints_sending_video") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("endpoints_sending_audio") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

targets.expr: sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="jitsi", pod=~"jitsi-.*", container=~".*", container!="POD"})
sum by (container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="jitsi", image!="", pod=~"jitsi-.*", container=~".*", container!="POD"}[4m]))
sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="jitsi", pod="$jitsi_host", container="jvb"})
sum by (container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="jitsi", image!="", pod="$jitsi_host", container="jvb"}[4m]))
sum by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="jitsi", pod="$jitsi_host", container="jvb"})
sum by (container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="jitsi", image!="", pod="$jitsi_host", container="jvb"}[4m]))

list.definition: select DISTINCT("host") from (select "host",last("conferences") from "jitsi_stats" where $timeFilter group by "host")
list.label: Vmeeting Servers
list.name: jitsi_host
list.query: select DISTINCT("host") from (select "host",last("conferences") from "jitsi_stats" where $timeFilter group by "host")
